verses.translation: 1. Nabiyow Yallih qokol (cató) kee makki fakim koh Yamaate waqdi.

verses.arabic_text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
verses.translation: 2. Kaadu seehadá Yallih diinit butta buttah culah table waqdi,

verses.arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
verses.translation: 3. Toysa Ku-Rabbi saytunnos kaa faylisak, kaadu dambi cabti kaal esser,, diggah usuk isil gaca marak gacim (toobat kinnuk) oggolaah qafu aba Rabbi kinnik.
